panels.description: EMQ messages stats not available in this grafana. So we use Private messages / User published messages as the north star here.

targets.expr: (sum(MessageUnicastToFriend{target=~"^d/.*", namespace=~"^$Namespace.*$"}) by (subtype) + sum(MessageSentToFriend{target=~"^d/.*", namespace=~"^$Namespace.*$"}) by (subtype))/ sum(MessageOverall{target=~"^d/.*", namespace=~"^$Namespace.*$"}) by (subtype)

Social Graph API error rate beyond 1%
